documentType: prison count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 24, 2019. It records official inmate counts by housing unit and includes specific inmate names and their assignments, notably listing Jeffrey Epstein by his inmate registration number (86409-054) in a suicide watch/hospital assignment.

persons.name: Bullock
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 86409-054 on the inmate roster, assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) with a note 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' on July 24, 2019. This is the alias or placeholder name used for Jeffrey Epstein in the prison system.

persons.name: Ayllon
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 86268-054 on the inmate roster, assigned to 'R&D' on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Reese
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 43667-007 on the inmate roster, assigned to 'R&D' on July 24, 2019.

events.title: Daily Prison Count and Inmate Roster
events.description: Routine official inmate counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York across various housing units. An inmate roster shows specific inmates and their assignments, including one (Bullock/Epstein) on suicide watch in the hospital.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 24, 2019, which is less than two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Inmate 'Bullock' (registration 86409-054) is listed with an assignment of 'HOSP' and a note 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', indicating he was on suicide watch or in the hospital unit.
The documents are official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and rosters, providing a snapshot of prison operations and inmate status at MCC New York on a specific date.
Multiple housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B) are listed with inmate counts, showing the facility's layout.
The inmate roster lists other inmates like 'Ayllon' and 'Reese' in a different assignment category ('R&D').
